metadata.title: CVE-2024-27436 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: usb-audio: Stop parsing channels bits when all channels are found.If a usb audio device sets more bits than the amount of channelsit could write outside of the map array.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
